jabber.stream.PacketCollector

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Default XMPP packet collector implementation.

Constructor

new(filters : Iterable<xmpp.PacketFilter>, handler : Dynamic -> Void, ?permanent : Bool, ?block : Bool)

Instance Variables

block : Bool

Block remaining collectors

filters(default,null) : jabber.stream._PacketCollector.FilterList

handlers : Array<xmpp.Packet -> Void>

Callbacks to which collected packets get delivered to.

permanent : Bool

Indicates if the the collector should get removed from the stream after collecting.

Instance Methods

accept(p : xmpp.Packet) : Bool

Returns true if the given XMPP packet passes through all filters.

deliver(p : xmpp.Packet) : Void

Delivers the given packet to all registerd handlers.
